metadata.title: Joe's Jeans Men's The Asher
features: FASHIONABLE JEANS FOR MEN: Make a statement without sacrificing comfort with our Asher men’s jean. Stylish and made from high-quality materials, these slim-fit jeans for men are ideal for dressing up or keeping it casual.

THE RIGHT FIT: This jean for men combines a great look with a great fit. Featuring a mid-rise waist with a slim, modern fit from the hip to the leg opening and a bit of stretch for a trendy slim-leg profile.

ELEVATED STYLE & QUALITY: These slim jeans for men are made from a high-quality 11-ounce stretch denim with a cotton-and-spandex blend. Each jean wash features unique details with expert stitching and a classic 5-pocket design

EASY CARE: A timeless cut and high-quality materials make these fashionable slim jeans for men a go-to wardrobe staple and a long-lasting investment in style. Simply machine wash the jeans to keep them looking their best with any outfit.

BE AUTHENTIC: Founded in 2001 with inherent L.A. sensibility and a rock-n-roll point of view, Joe’s Jeans redefines everyday style with jeans that combine the perfect fit, comfort, and quality with timeless and trendy good looks.
description: Timeless and stylish with the right touch of edgy, urban flair, The Asher Men’s Slim-Fit Jean combines looks and comfort that can go from a casual day with friends to a night out on the town. With an updated, classic style, this signature designer jean provides a perfect fit that looks great no matter where you wear them. Our jeans create a confident look for those who want to make a statement without sacrificing comfort.Made from high-quality 11-ounce stretch denim with a blend of cotton and spandex, our Asher jean offers optimum stretch, all-day comfort, and an ideal fit. These jeans have 5 classic-style pockets with ample room for your wallet and keys and a mid-rise belt-loop waistband with a 10-inch rise. They feature a zipper fly, button closure, and unique detailing, and their narrow cut and straight-legged style create a tailored silhouette with 14-inch leg openings. Available in multiple sizes and washes, these jeans are machine washable for long-lasting, elevated style in any wardrobe.Joe’s Jeans delivers trendy, timeless denim for men and women with the latest technology and highest-quality materials to create beautiful jeans with a flawless fit.
